name: Dino Craft City Terror
description:
Calling all dino enthusiasts!

Put on your palaeontologist hat, and grab your tools, because you’re digging for your very own dino!

In this game, you start with your own unique dinosaur, with various dino breed and patterns.

You can have your dinosaurs breed and create a new generation of itself. Unlock a new dinosaur and learn the facts behind that particular dinosaur! Collect all the cards and get as many breeds of dino as you can!

Use your pickaxe and brush to excavate and discover various ornaments. You can decorate and build new dinosaurs with the ornaments you collect, and craft them into even more unique creatures!

Features:
A multitude of combinations of starter dinos
Palaeontology game of excavating new ornaments
Educational dinosaur facts from collecting cards
Chances for unleashed creativity to craft the dinosaur you want
